scripts.start:docker: docker run --rm -it --network host -v "$PWD":/app -w /app node:22 bash -lc 'npm ci && node bot.js'
scripts.start:docker:daemon: docker rm -f mc-bot >/dev/null 2>&1 || true && docker run -d --name mc-bot --network host -v "$PWD":/app -w /app node:22 bash -lc "npm ci && node bot.js"
